short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get powerful LinkedIn insights and track your top leads, prospects, and connections for better engagement and content strategy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SocialSense is a tool for LinkedIn professionals looking to optimize their engagement and content strategy. 

With two core features—LinkedIn Analytics and Lead Tracking—this extension helps users understand their content performance, track key profiles, and engage meaningfully with their audience.

LinkedIn Analytics: View detailed analytics of your posts to identify your top-performing content. Discover what works, track engagement trends, and build a content strategy based on real data.

Lead Tracking: Never miss an update from your favorite LinkedIn creators, prospects, clients, or hiring candidates. Get real-time updates, comment on their posts, and use the insights for content inspiration and outreach.

Key Features:

- Track and visualize LinkedIn post performance with detailed analytics.
- Identify and save your top-performing posts for content inspiration.
- Easily engage with tracked profiles—creators, prospects, clients, and more.
- Monitor competitors’ and industry leaders’ content strategies.
- Build a better LinkedIn presence through data-driven content creation.

Ideal for sales professionals, recruiters, content creators, and LinkedIn enthusiasts aiming to level up their LinkedIn game.
